name: Minus GF's Soda (P)
description:
Warning: Contains belly expansion fetish content.

Hello! Here's the first Patreon mini-game, featuring art by Bell-on-Supremacy of Minus GF from a FNF mod. You can help determine the next Patreon mini-game's character and mechanics, and also receive it early by supporting me on Patreon.

Controls:
R to restart
Click the +/- buttons on the game screen to increase/decrease belly size.
Left click Minus GF's belly to shake it, hold right mouse to settle it.

Special thanks to barosans for being the Patron for this first project, and Bell-on-Supremacy for providing the art and helping with the asset work!
